body_html: Quantized ops currently only work on the CPU, because most GPUs don't support eight-bit matrix multiplications natively. I have just seen that the latest TitanX Pascal cards offer eight-bit support though, so I'm hoping we will be able to use that in the future.
body_text: Quantized ops currently only work on the CPU, because most GPUs don't support eight-bit matrix multiplications natively. I have just seen that the latest TitanX Pascal cards offer eight-bit support though, so I'm hoping we will be able to use that in the future.
body: Quantized ops currently only work on the CPU, because most GPUs don't support eight-bit matrix multiplications natively. I have just seen that the latest TitanX Pascal cards offer eight-bit support though, so I'm hoping we will be able to use that in the future.
